ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are indebted to Abdul Hussain Al Khayyat and Abdullah S. A., the University of Salahaddin-Erbil, Iraq, for the plant identification. Raffaella Gaggeri, Dipartimento di Scienze del Farmaco, and Daniela Buonocore, Dipartimento di Biologia e Biotecnologie, University of Pavia, are thanked for technical assistance in the DPPH and TAOC assays. The Universidad TÃ©cnica Particular de Loja (UTPL) is acknowledged for supporting open access publication.
